name: Basmati Rice
description: World's finest aromatic long-grain rice. Premium varieties including 1121, 1509, and Pusa Basmati. Extra-long grains (8.35mm+) with distinctive fragrance and exceptional elongation after cooking. Sourced from Punjab, Haryana, and Uttarakhand.

name: Non-Basmati Rice
description: High-quality non-aromatic rice varieties for daily consumption and commercial use. Includes IR64, Sona Masoori, Swarna, and Parboiled rice. Excellent for bulk orders with competitive pricing and consistent quality.

name: Wheat
description: Being a respected exporter of wheat in the global agro-food products market, we abide by all international standards. Clients obtain superior quality wheat sourced from the best fields.

name: Chickpeas (Kabuli Chana)
description: Premium quality Kabuli Chickpeas (Garbanzo Beans) known for their light color, smooth texture, and nutty flavor. Available in 8mm, 9mm, and 10mm Bold sizes, machine-cleaned and sortexed for superior quality.

name: Pulses & Lentils
description: Comprehensive range of high-quality Indian lentils and beans including Red Lentils (Masoor), Green Mung, Toor Dal, Urad Dal, and Kidney Beans (Rajma). Processed to meet international export standards.
